thread.section_title: Hallowood Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hallowood Furniture | www.hallowood.co.uk
thread.title: HOWARD HUMPHREY
thread.title_full: Hallowood Furniture reviewed by HOWARD HUMPHREY

author: HOWARD HUMPHREY
title: HOWARD HUMPHREY
text: Excellent service throughout the process from our initial sales contact with Darren at your Coventry Store to the ontime delivery by two very obliging members. Packaging was substantial ensuring our products were received in perfect condition.
